item.title: Anahita Render Engine
item.description: This is a renderer that I have developed for bachlor’s degree project. At the begining, I used Blinn-Phong rendering model for it and now I am working on implementing a physically-based rendering model. For controlling the objects in the scene from light sources to complicated mesh objects and for the sake of debugging, I also implemented a GUI using Dear ImGui. Here you can load meshes to the scene through GUI that under the hood uses Assimp library and beside that you can control each object attributes.
